text: Night Editor is a 1946 American crime movie directed by Henry Levin and was based on the radio program of the same name. It stars William Gargan, Janis Carter, Jeff Donnell, Charles D. Brown, Paul E. Burns, Frank Wilcox and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Levin
title: Night Editor
